content: शंबूकः {@--1@} A bivalve shell (शंबूका also in this sense). {@--2@} A small conch-shell. {@--3@} A snail. {@--4@} The edge of the frontal protuberance of an elephant. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Śūdra (who practised penance though forbidden to his caste and was in consequence slain by Rāma; see {%inter alia%} <ls>U. 2.</ls> and <ls>R. 15</ls>).
